name: Crimson Crypt
description:
In this game you play as a virus in a world of a computer, your goal is to infect as many files (blocks) as you can by colliding with them!

Please download the game for the best quality experience! ControlsKeyboardMovement                                                                                                    A & D or Arrow Keys                                                                                                                JumpSpaceDash (speedrunner mode)Shift

This is a game that I began working on almost 2 years ago. It was planned to  be the first game I'd ever release to the public. Sadly, I never got to finish it. So I took the "Revival" Jam as an opportunity to revive my long dead game. This is just a short demo of the game and I'm still working on the story of the full game.

Features to be added:

  • 50+ level campaign!
  • Level editor!
  • Challenger & Hardcore difficulty!
  • More sound effects!
  • More polish!

Credits:

  • Programming, Art & VFX - Danial Jumagaliyev
  • Music - Patrick De Arteaga

Here are some old screenshots of how the game looked in the past:

The levels were very short and the movement of the player felt very slow paced. The quality of the background was very poor, it was a video from YouTube 😅
